price: 18. (Soki batuni ye) ezali nini? (Akolobaka ezali nde mwana mwasi), oyo akoki kosala ata eloko moko te, mpe akoki mpe kotelema тропа koloba polele te, sé kosala mabe.
arabic: أَوَمَن يُنَشَّؤُاْ فِي ٱلۡحِلۡيَةِ وَهُوَ فِي ٱلۡخِصَامِ غَيۡرُ مُبِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: awaman yunasha-u fī al-ḥil'yati wahuwa fī al-khiṣāmi ghayru mubīnin
